abstract: In 62 seasons of playing against each other, the 49ers and Lions have rarely had a relevant matchup. With both teams off to a strong start, this season is the exception to the rule.
snippet: In 62 seasons of playing against each other, the 49ers and Lions have rarely had a relevant matchup. With both teams off to a strong start, this season is the exception to the rule.
lead_paragraph: It would seem unlikely that over the course of 62 seasons, two N.F.L. teams could combine for eight championships but manage to play each other in 50 largely irrelevant games. But mediocrity has been the standard when it comes to games between the Detroit Lions and San Francisco 49ers.
